<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream">formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> - A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> that wraps another one and keeps track of line and column position, allowing padding out to specific column boundaries and querying the number of lines written to the stream. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#details">More...</a>

<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream - A raw&#95;ostream that wraps another one and keeps track</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of line and column position, allowing padding out to specific column</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// boundaries and querying the number of lines written to the stream. This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// assumes that the contents of the stream is valid UTF-8 encoded text. This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// doesn&#39;t attempt to handle everything Unicode can do (combining characters,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// right-to-left markers, etc), but should cover the cases likely to appear in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// source code or diagnostic messages.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#adb8a7ef601b3598707e6ae9a6c9f6e4d">formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f4b64a0f7aec0a02e7f2ff5a6552723">raw&#95;ostream</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// TheStream - The real stream we output to. We set it to be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// unbuffered, since we&#39;re already doing our own buffering.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f4b64a0f7aec0a02e7f2ff5a6552723">raw&#95;ostream</a> &#42;TheStream;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// been flushed and the portion of the buffer that&#39;s been</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// PartialUTF8Char - Either empty or a prefix of a UTF-8 code unit sequence</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// for a Unicode scalar value which should be prepended to the buffer for the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// next call to ComputePosition. This is needed when the buffer is flushed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// when it ends part-way through the UTF-8 encoding of a Unicode scalar</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// value, so that we can compute the display width of the character once we</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// have the rest of it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// position after output. This is safe to call multiple times on the same</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// buffer, as it records the most recently scanned character and resumes from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// there when the buffer has not been flushed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream - Open the specified file for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// writing. If an error occurs, information about the error is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// put into ErrorInfo, and the stream should be immediately</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// destroyed; the string will be empty if no error occurred.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// As a side effect, the given Stream is set to be Unbuffered.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is because formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream does its own buffering,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// so it doesn&#39;t want another layer of buffering to be happening</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// underneath it.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#adb8a7ef601b3598707e6ae9a6c9f6e4d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#adb8a7ef601b3598707e6ae9a6c9f6e4d">formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a0f4b64a0f7aec0a02e7f2ff5a6552723">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;Stream)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">      : TheStream(nullptr), Position(0, 0), DisableScan(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    setStream(Stream);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#a91b597f0ba8945f847b8df2ff00e5880"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">explicit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#a91b597f0ba8945f847b8df2ff00e5880">formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a>()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">      : TheStream(nullptr), Position(0, 0), Scanned(nullptr),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">        DisableScan(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a>) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#a0eb361f836554627ef51810e0d3646c6"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#a0eb361f836554627ef51810e0d3646c6">~formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> override </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a520bdf57dfe3e73abb53d482893f0a27">flush</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">    releaseStream();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// PadToColumn - Align the output to some column number.  If the current</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// column is already equal to or more than NewCol, PadToColumn inserts one</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// space.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param NewCol - The column to move to.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream">formatted&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#a1fc7f913807a21ba5a42df7cc2d2e748">PadToColumn</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewCol);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#a65290bab4b83149e403bf48709658bd1"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formatted-raw-ostream/#a65290bab4b83149e403bf48709658bd1">getColumn</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate current position, taking buffer contents into account.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    ComputePosition(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a980ad6112624b521eb2d831b39b346eb">getBufferStart</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#ad6cd89674692383208613b1e4ee560fe">GetNumBytesInBuffer</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Position.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate current position, taking buffer contents into account.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    ComputePosition(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#a980ad6112624b521eb2d831b39b346eb">getBufferStart</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream/#ad6cd89674692383208613b1e4ee560fe">GetNumBytesInBuffer</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
